-----
This article is so sweet and cute. ðŸ˜­

I love the imagery and how overall just wholesome it is. I'm a sentimental dumbass so ofc this one got me big. It's just a gentle, positive but sad story about grief, love, and the end of life. The build-up feels graceful and the end is well earned.

I like this one. Go read it.

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
